Name: Squatch
About the game: Squatch is a puzzle game in which you attempt to connect all squares in a scene by color matching their sides. Discover over 40 hand-crafted levels Play in 4 beautiful environments Unlock a secret reward Enjoy hours of fun challenging puzzles
